name: Grilled Asparagus
briefdescription: Grilled asparagus is easy to make in a matter of minutes for a simple summer side dish that allows the natural flavor of asparagus to shine.
instructions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate.
Lightly coat the asparagus spears with olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Cook asparagus on the preheated grill, turning often until lightly charred and fork-tender about 3 to 5 minutes.

comments.comment: It was excellent! I also added garlic salt. 😋
